languages.text: "Это место пропитано скверной, а значит — должно быть очищено. Огнем. До самого дальнего закутка".
"This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."
languages.original_text: "Это место пропитано скверной, а значит — должно быть очищено. Огнем. До самого дальнего закутка".

traits.locale_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."
"This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."
"This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."
"This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

languages.text: “这个地方已经遭到了腐化。这意味着它必须接受烈焰的净化，连一个缝隙都不能遗漏。”
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方已经遭到了腐化。这意味着它必须接受烈焰的净化，连一个缝隙都不能遗漏。”

languages.text: «Este lugar está sumido en la corrupción, lo que significa que ha de ser purgado. Con fuego. Hasta el último rincón».
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: «Este lugar está sumido en la corrupción, lo que significa que ha de ser purgado. Con fuego. Hasta el último rincón».

languages.text: 「この場所は、腐敗で染まっている。つまり、浄化しなければならないということだ。炎を持って、隅々まで」
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所は、腐敗で染まっている。つまり、浄化しなければならないということだ。炎を持って、隅々まで」

languages.text: "Dieser Ort versinkt in Verderbtheit und muss daher gereinigt werden. Mit Feuer. Bis auf den letzten Rest."
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Ort versinkt in Verderbtheit und muss daher gereinigt werden. Mit Feuer. Bis auf den letzten Rest."

languages.text: « Ce lieu baigne dans la corruption et doit être purifié. Par le feu. Jusque dans le moindre recoin. »
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: « Ce lieu baigne dans la corruption et doit être purifié. Par le feu. Jusque dans le moindre recoin. »

languages.text: "Burası yozlaşmışlığa batmış, yani temizlenmesi gerekiyor. Ateşle. En son gediğine kadar."
languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

traits.locale_text: "Burası yozlaşmışlığa batmış, yani temizlenmesi gerekiyor. Ateşle. En son gediğine kadar."

languages.original_text: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."
